MemoryInfobox.name: Not Just Decoration
MemoryInfobox.description: 'A spy who claimed her jewelry was inscribed with secret codes had her earrings stolen by bandits.'

General_Description: '''Not Just Decoration''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: A spy for [[Athens]] sought the aid of a [[mercenary]]. Kassandra answered.
Section_Dialogue:
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I picked up your message on the [[Message board|board]]. What's happening?''
*'''Woman:''' ''Bandits have stolen my earrings, ''misthios!
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Just your earrings? Count yourself lucky they didn't kill you.''
*'''Woman:''' ''This isn't an ordinary pair of earrings.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''What makes them so special? Were they a gift from a lover?''
*'''Woman:''' ''No. The set was inscribed with an important message for the Athenian commander. It's easy to use jewelry to send secret messages. The men never bother to look.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''So you want me to take it from the bandits.''
*'''Woman:''' ''By [[Zeus]], you'd do that for me?''
(Accept - I'll bring it to you.)
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I'll help you. You have my word.''
*'''Woman:''' ''Perfect. Time is of the essence.''
*'''Kassandra:''' Chaire.
Kassandra sought out the camp of the bandits, and infiltrated it, retrieving the jewelry before returning to the woman.
*'''Woman:''' ''Tell me it's been handled,'' misthios.
*'''Kassandra:''' ''It's all yours.''
*'''Woman:''' ''Job well done, mercenary. Here, this is yours.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Happy to help.''
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
